text: @SenatorLankford @JohnCornyn its unbelievable that your first instinct is to hand corporations MORE MONEY.  that money needs to go to buying supplies, tests, and building hospitals.  Not Boeing who bought back their stock at absurd valuations.  Shame on for using coronavirus to try to enrich your overlords.
